title: Obesity-related cancers rising in young adults in the US

title_detail.value: Obesity-related cancers rising in young adults in the US

summary: A new study finds rates are increasing for six of 12 cancers related to obesity in younger adults in the United States, with steeper increases in progressively younger ages and successively younger generations.

summary_detail.value: A new study finds rates are increasing for six of 12 cancers related to obesity in younger adults in the United States, with steeper increases in progressively younger ages and successively younger generations.
